org.alljoyn.bus.annotation

Annotation Type BusMethod


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface BusMethod
    Indicates that a particular member of an AllJoyn exportable interface is defined to be a AllJoyn method.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int annotation
      Annotate introspection data for method.
      String description
      Description of this method
      String name
      Override of method name.
      String replySignature
      Output signature for method.
      String signature
      Input signature for method.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Override of method name. The default AllJoyn method name is the Java method name.
        Default:
        ""

      • signature

        public abstract String signature
        Input signature for method.
        See Also:
        Signature
        Default:
        ""

      • replySignature

        public abstract String replySignature
        Output signature for method.
        See Also:
        Signature
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Description of this method
        Default:
        ""

      • annotation

        public abstract int annotation
        Annotate introspection data for method. The annotation is the exclusive OR of the flags ANNOTATE_NO_REPLY and ANNOTATE_DEPRECATED. See org.freedesktop.DBus.Deprecated and org.freedesktop.DBus.Method.NoReply in the D-Bus Specification.
        Default:
        0
